Author: budu3
Content: I agree with most people on this thread. There's an information overload. Plus I suggest you hire a web designer. The design is not doing your service justice.

Author: staunch
Content:
I would keep pretty hush about it unless there's some real chance your employer is going to say "Wow that's cool -- why don't you partner with me and I'll invest $5M."

People can get petty and weird when they're jealous or angry.\n

Author: philc
Content:
Juwo, this is the most confusing thing I've ever looked at. I have a feeling the product is not very focused itself, and thus is hard to convey. If you can't convey it in a single page with a few terse sentences (ala skype.com), you might need to redesign and make it simpler.

I'm glad you're a Christian, but a company-about page is probably not the best place for pro/con links. It's distracting.
